document.full_text: for the better part of the past decade, and particularly in the past few months, the dollar has been the weakling of the foreign exchange world. that may be starting to change.
document.title: some see rise ahead for dollar
lines_and_colors: for the better part of the past decade, and particularly in the past few months, the dollar has been the weakling of the foreign exchange world. that may be starting to change.
